front.title: A YANG Data Model for Segment Routing in IPv6 (SRv6) support in Path Computation Element Communications Protocol (PCEP)

abstract.t: This document augments a YANG data model for the management of Path Computation Element communications Protocol (PCEP) for communications between a Path Computation Client (PCC) and a Path Computation Element (PCE), or between two PCEs in support for Segment Routing in IPv6. The data model includes configuration data and state data (status information and counters for the collection of statistics).
